tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (JJ Good) (NN news)) (ADVP (RB always)) (VP (VBZ comes) (SBAR (WHADVP (RB just) (WRB when)) (S (NP (PRP you)) (VP (VBP need) (NP (PRP it)))))) (. !)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [comes/VBZ nsubj>[news/NN amod>Good/JJ] advmod>always/RB advcl>[need/VBP advmod>[when/WRB advmod>just/RB] nsubj>you/PRP dobj>it/PRP] punct>!/.]

tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (FRAG (SBAR (RB Just) (S (VP (VBD saw) (SBAR (IN that) (S (S (NP (NP (NN Na) (NN Hong-jin)) (, ,) (NP (NP (NN director)) (PP (IN of) (NP (DT THE) (NN CHASER))))) (VP (VBD made) (NP (DT a) (JJ new) (NN movie)))) (CC and) (S (NP (PRP it)) (VP (VBZ 's) (ADVP (RB out)) (ADVP (RB now))))))))) (. !)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [saw/VBD advmod>Just/RB ccomp>[made/VBD mark>that/IN nsubj>[Hong-jin/NN compound>Na/NN punct>,/, appos>[director/NN nmod:of>[CHASER/NN case>of/IN det>THE/DT]]] dobj>[movie/NN det>a/DT amod>new/JJ] cc>and/CC conj:and>['s/VBZ nsubj>it/PRP advmod>out/RB advmod>now/RB]] ccomp>'s/VBZ punct>!/.]
